segments.text: I see the puddle growing under the woman’s feet, and it's almost as if time has slowed down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to care or even notice, caught in her domestic routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of frustration at the carelessness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is stretching for cookies like they’re the only thing in the world worth reaching for.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused, but I want to shout at him to be careful!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her eyes wide, perfectly embodying the spirit of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, filled with warmth and laughter, seems on the brink of calamity.
segments.speaker: PAR
